# Arpeggio: Major 7th in A (Shape: G)

## Brief Presentation
This arpeggio consists of the notes A, C#, E, and G# and can be played following the shape of a G major chord. It is known as the Major 7th arpeggio in the key of A.

## Notes and Intervals
- Root (1st): A
- Major 3rd: C#
- Perfect 5th: E
- Major 7th: G#

## Genre and Musical Flavor
This arpeggio is commonly used in jazz and fusion genres due to its sophisticated and lush sound. It provides a jazzy and dreamy musical flavor, adding a sense of tension and resolution to compositions.
